s01e01.title: Pilot
s01e01.description: An ex-lawyer is forced to return to community college to get a degree. However, he tries to use the skills he learned as a lawyer to get the answers to all his tests and pick up on a sexy woman in his Spanish class.

s01e02.title: Spanish 101
s01e02.description: Jeff takes steps to ensure that Britta will be his partner in Spanish class, but winds up with Pierce instead.

s01e03.title: Introduction to Film
s01e03.description: Britta comes between Abed and his father when she signs him up for a film class, and Jeff risks failing a class unless he "seizes the day."

s01e04.title: Social Psychology
s01e04.description: Jeff and Shirley bond by making fun of Britta's new hippie boyfriend, which doesn't go well for any involved. Meanwhile, Troy and Abed become pawns in Annie's psychology experiment.

s01e05.title: Advanced Criminal Law
s01e05.description: Señor Chang is on the hunt for a cheater and threatens to fail the entire class if the culprit doesn't come forward. When someone confesses, Jeff comes to their defense. Meanwhile, Annie recruits Pierce to write the new school song.

s01e06.title: Football, Feminism and You
s01e06.description: Jeff talks Troy into playing for the college's football team, sparking Annie's anger. Pierce helps the dean come up with a new mascot, and Britta tries to become Shirley's bathroom friend.

s01e07.title: Introduction to Statistics
s01e07.description: Will Jeff blow off Annie's Halloween party and sell out his other classmates in order to get a chance to score with a sexy professor?

s01e08.title: Home Economics
s01e08.description: When Jeff loses his home and his car, he is forced to move into Abed's dorm room. Troy has a big date, but why is a jealous Annie trying to help? Meanwhile, Pierce becomes the keyboardist for Vaughn's band.

s01e09.title: Debate 109
s01e09.description: Jeff reluctantly agrees to be Annie's debate partner, Britta humors Pierce by letting him try hypnotherapy on her to get her to stop smoking, and the gang begins to think that Abed's films may predict their future.

s01e10.title: Environmental Science
s01e10.description: Jeff hangs out with Senor Chang to get out of an essay, angering the rest of the group. Meanwhile, Abed and Troy search for their missing lab mouse, and Pierce helps Shirley out with a presentation.

s01e11.title: Politics of Human Sexuality
s01e11.description: Annie helps the dean put on an "STD Fair," but doesn't want to perform an embarrassing demonstration. Meanwhile Jeff finds a companion for a double date with Pierce, and Troy finds out that Abed is a better athlete than him.

s01e12.title: Comparative Religion
s01e12.description: Shirley throws a Christmas party for the gang and much to her surprise learns her classmates come from various religious backgrounds. Meanwhile, Jeff is challenged by the school bully and faces the reality that he may fail Spanish 101.

s01e13.title: Investigative Journalism
s01e13.description: The gang decides not to let an obnoxious student from their Spanish class into the study group. The dean appoints Jeff as editor of the student paper, where Annie is working on a story that could expose the dean as a racist.

s01e14.title: Interpretive Dance
s01e14.description: Jeff runs in to problems when the study group and the dean discover that he's seeing a professor, while Troy and Britta discover each other's secret that they are both taking dance classes.

s01e15.title: Romantic Expressionism
s01e15.description: When Annie starts hanging out with Britta's ex-boyfriend Vaughn, Britta and Jeff vow to protect her. Meanwhile, Pierce feels left out at Troy and Abed's movie night.

s01e16.title: Communication Studies
s01e16.description: Jeff sets out to fix his relationship with Britta after things get awkward with a drunken phone call. Meanwhile, Annie and Shirley make plans to humiliate Señor Chang in order to defend Troy and Pierce's dignity.

s01e17.title: Physical Education
s01e17.description: Jeff refuses to participate in a pool class because the teacher forces him to play in gym shorts, and the study group discovers a white version of Abed at the college.

s01e18.title: Basic Genealogy
s01e18.description: It's Family Day at Greendale. Pierce tries to build a relationship with his stepdaughter, but she has eyes for Jeff instead. Britta gets in trouble with Troy's Nana, and Shirley's kids cause problems for Abed's father.

s01e19.title: Beginner Pottery
s01e19.description: Jeff signs up for a pottery class for an easy credit, but winds up failing the class when his jealousy of another student gets the best of him. Meanwhile, Pierce's incompetence could ruin his group's grade in boating class.

s01e20.title: The Science of Illusion
s01e20.description: Britta's April Fool's Day prank has disastrous consequences, but she refuses to confess that she was responsible. Annie and Shirley temporarily work as security guards, but both of them want to be the "bad cop."

s01e21.title: Contemporary American Poultry
s01e21.description: Jeff's plan to get chicken fingers from the school cafeteria for the study group quickly evolves into a mafia movie-style endeavor with Abed calling all the shots.

s01e22.title: The Art of Discourse
s01e22.description: Shirley gets Pierce kicked out the study group, Jeff and Britta plot revenge on a group of high schoolers who make fun of them for attending community college, and Troy helps Abed accomplish some of his movie-clichéd social goals.

s01e23.title: Modern Warfare
s01e23.description: Greendale Community College is transformed into an apocalyptic war zone when the dean promises the winner of a paintball competition priority registration, and it could fan the flames of sexual tension between Jeff and Britta.

s01e24.title: English as a Second Language
s01e24.description: Annie uses inside information about Señor Chang to get him fired so that the study group will be forced to stay together and take Spanish again. Meanwhile, Troy discovers that he has a natural skill for plumbing.

s01e25.title: Pascal's Triangle Revisited
s01e25.description: Britta and Professor Slater fight for the affection of Jeff. Meanwhile, Troy is confused when Abed doesn't invite him to move into his dorm room.

s02e01.title: Anthropology 101
s02e01.description: Jeff and Britta engage in a dangerous game of relationship one-upsmanship in response to Britta's embarrassing moment at the end of the previous school year, which could cause the entire study group to fall apart.

s02e02.title: Accounting for Lawyers
s02e02.description: Jeff blows off the study group and their break-dancing competition to hang out with his old co-workers at the law firm, but Annie tries to prove that one of them is the person who turned him in and got him fired.

s02e03.title: The Psychology of Letting Go
s02e03.description: Pierce's religion convinces him that the spirit of his dead mother is captured in a cheap lava lamp, Jeff has a crisis of faith when he learns he has high cholesterol, and Britta and Annie try to raise money for the oil spill.

s02e04.title: Basic Rocket Science
s02e04.description: Everyone in the study group except Abed is stuck in a crude 1980s space simulator as it is towed off campus, and Abed leads the team given the difficult assignment of bringing them home.

s02e05.title: Messianic Myths and Ancient Peoples
s02e05.description: Shirley asks Abed to make a film about Jesus, but he quickly angers Shirley by turning it into a self-indulgent mess. Meanwhile, Pierce begins blowing off the study group to hang out with the "hipsters."

s02e06.title: Epidemiology
s02e06.description: The study group is left to fend for themselves by Dean Pelton during a rabies outbreak due to tainted food at Greendale's Halloween party.

s02e07.title: Aerodynamics of Gender
s02e07.description: Britta, Annie and Shirley discover that Abed is skilled at insulting the mean girls, so they use him to their advantage. Meanwhile, Troy and Jeff find a secret garden with a trampoline, which they use for relaxation.

s02e08.title: Cooperative Calligraphy
s02e08.description: Chaos and mistrust tear the study group apart as they try to figure out who stole Annie's pen, causing them to miss the Greendale Puppy Parade.

s02e09.title: Conspiracy Theories and Interior Design
s02e09.description: Dean Pelton tries to bust Jeff for a phony night school credit, which only unveils a series of conspiracies, plots, and double-crosses between Jeff, Annie, and the dean.

s02e10.title: Mixology Certification
s02e10.description: The study group takes Troy out to a bar to celebrate his 21st birthday. While there, Annie assumes a new identity, Abed is propositioned by a man, one of Shirley's secrets is discovered, and Britta and Jeff fight over the "cool" bars.

s02e11.title: Abed's Uncontrollable Christmas
s02e11.description: When Abed wakes up to discover that everything is in stop motion animation, Professor Duncan and the study group help him try to discover the true meaning of Christmas.

s02e12.title: Asian Population Studies
s02e12.description: Annie lobbies for her new crush, who is also Jeff's rival, to join the study group, but a jealous Jeff counters with Chang. Meanwhile, Shirley announces that she's pregnant, but she doesn't know that it could be Chang's.

s02e13.title: Celebrity Pharmacology 212
s02e13.description: Pierce bribes Annie into getting him a bigger role in her anti-drug play, Jeff gets in trouble when he sends a lewd text message from Britta's phone, and Shirley rejects Chang's attempts to be friendly to her.

s02e14.title: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons
s02e14.description: The study group plays Dungeons & Dragons with another classmate to improve his spirits, but Pierce's jealousies cause their good intentions to backfire.

s02e15.title: Early 21st Century Romanticism
s02e15.description: Jeff hangs out with Professor Duncan after a fight with the study group, but Chang tags along and starts a party. Meanwhile, Abed and Troy fight for a librarian's affection, and Britta goes to a dance with a girl she thinks is a lesbian.

s02e16.title: Intermediate Documentary Filmmaking
s02e16.description: Pierce pretends to be dying so that he can bequeath a series of cryptic and sometimes mean-spirited gifts to his study partners, and Abed decides to shoot a documentary film of the situation.

s02e17.title: Intro to Political Science
s02e17.description: Anticipating a visit from the vice president, dean Pelton holds an election for student body president. An idealistic Annie decides to run, but Jeff decides to run against her to spite her and show how stupid politics can be.

s02e18.title: Custody Law and Eastern European Diplomacy
s02e18.description: Jeff uses Shirley's parental rights waiver against Chang as a way to get Chang out of the apartment, while Britta is afraid to tell Abed and Troy that their new friend is a war criminal.

s02e19.title: Critical Film Studies
s02e19.description: Jeff's "Pulp Fiction"-themed surprise party for Abed is spoiled when Abed tells him over dinner that he's done with pop culture.

s02e20.title: Competitive Wine Tasting
s02e20.description: Jeff suspects something isn't quite right when an attractive classmate gets engaged to marry Pierce .

s02e21.title: Paradigms of Human Memory
s02e21.description: While working on the final diorama for their anthropology class, Chang discovers the cache of items stolen by Troy's monkey.

s02e22.title: Applied Anthropology and Culinary Arts
s02e22.description: As the semester draws to a close, the anthropology class final is disrupted when Shirley goes into labor one month ahead of schedule.

s02e23.title: A Fistful of Paintballs
s02e23.description: In a "spaghetti western" parody, Pierce tries to get revenge on the rest of the study group during this year's paintball tournament.

s02e24.title: For a Few Paintballs More
s02e24.description: When the study group learns that there's a sinister plot behind the paintball tournament, they unite the remaining players to defeat the enemy.

s03e01.title: Biology 101
s03e01.description: Jeff's plan to keep Pierce out of the Study Group backfires when he gets kicked out instead, Abed copes with bad news about Cougar Town, and Dean Pelton's authority is challenged by another Greendale dean.

s03e02.title: Geography of Global Conflict
s03e02.description: When another over-achieving student steals Annie's idea for a Model U.N. club, the Study Group comes to her rescue. Meanwhile, new security cop Chang tries to stop Britta's last-ditch efforts to create a campus disturbance.

s03e03.title: Competitive Ecology
s03e03.description: Chaos ensues when the Study Group tries to divide itself up into biology lab partners, and Chang appoints himself security "detective," and tries to solve a mystery that is only in his head.

s03e04.title: Remedial Chaos Theory
s03e04.description: At Abed and Troy's housewarming party, Jeff decides to let the decision on who gets the pizza rest on the roll of the dice, leaving Abed to contemplate six alternate realities.

s03e05.title: Horror Fiction in Seven Spooky Steps
s03e05.description: During her pre-Halloween party, Britta gets everyone to tell a spooky story so that she can find out which member of the study group scored out as a psychopath on their psychology profiles.

s03e06.title: Advanced Gay
s03e06.description: Pierce gets a visit from his bigoted father after his wipes become a hit in the gay community, and the dean of the School of Refrigeration recruits Troy to become his student.

s03e07.title: Studies in Modern Movement
s03e07.description: The study group helps Annie move in with Troy and Abed - except for Jeff, who lies to get out of it but is busted by dean Pelton.

s03e08.title: Documentary Filmmaking: Redux
s03e08.description: The dean is given the task of making a Greendale commercial, but the shoot soon goes over budget and spirals out of control - with Abed documenting the experience.

s03e09.title: Foosball and Nocturnal Vigilantism
s03e09.description: Shirley teaches Jeff foosball so that he can beat a team of cocky, obnoxious Germans, while Annie creates an overly elaborate ruse so that she doesn't have to tell Abed that she broke his special edition The Dark Knight DVD.

s03e10.title: Regional Holiday Music
s03e10.description: A holiday-themed parody of "Glee" in which Abed tries to persuade each member of the Study Group to join the glee club so that they can qualify for regionals.

s03e11.title: Urban Matrimony and the Sandwich Arts
s03e11.description: Pierce comes to Shirley with a business proposal just as she's about to get married to Andre. Meanwhile, Troy and Abed try to act "normal" for the wedding, Britta discovers a new skill, and Jeff struggles with his toast.

s03e12.title: Contemporary Impressionists
s03e12.description: The members of the Study Group take jobs as celebrity impersonators to pay off Abed's debt to a celebrity impersonator business, but can Jeff be Ryan Seacrest without his fragile ego spiral out of control?

s03e13.title: Digital Exploration of Interior Design
s03e13.description: When Britta falls for the human embodiment of the Subway sandwich chain, Shirley and Pierce hope to use the situation to their advantage.

s03e14.title: Pillows and Blankets
s03e14.description: The students of Greendale are drawn into an epic pillow fight as Troy and Abed start a war that threatens to destroy their unique friendship.

s03e15.title: Origins of Vampire Mythology
s03e15.description: With Joel McHale, Gillian Jacobs, Danny Pudi, Yvette Nicole Brown. While Britta struggles to stay away from her old carny boyfriend, Jeff becomes obsessed with their relationship. Meanwhile, the dean stops by Troy and Abed's to recruit Troy for the dean of the school of refrigeration.

s03e16.title: Virtual Systems Analysis
s03e16.description: After sending Troy and Britta on a date, Annie volunteers to keep Abed company in his Dreamatorium.

s03e17.title: Basic Lupine Urology
s03e17.description: When the yam the study group was growing for biology class is killed, Troy and Abed are on the case.

s03e18.title: Course Listing Unavailable
s03e18.description: A fellow student has died and Biology class has been canceled, meaning everyone has to retake it in summer school. When the memorial service turns into a riot, Chang is granted special authoritative powers.

s03e19.title: Curriculum Unavailable
s03e19.description: When Abed claims the Dean has been replaced by a doppelgänger he is forced to take psychiatric treatment. Naturally, the rest of the study group joins him at his session with Dr. Heidi.

s03e20.title: Digital Estate Planning
s03e20.description: The study group must help Pierce win a video game so that he can claim his inheritance from his father, but somebody may be out to ensure that he loses.

s03e21.title: The First Chang Dynasty
s03e21.description: The Study Group, now known as the "Greendale Seven," launches a plot to rescue the real dean Pelton and end Chang's reign of terror over Greendale.

s03e22.title: Introduction to Finality
s03e22.description: Jeff faces an old nemesis as Shirley and Pierce square off in Greendale court, Abed succumbs to his evil alter ego, and Troy decides to meet his destiny at air conditioning school.

s04e01.title: History 101
s04e01.description: While the Dean creates a Hunger Games-style competition for admission into a History of Ice Cream class, the final class Jeff needs to graduate and a fear of graduation causes Abed to retreat to his happy place.

s04e02.title: Paranormal Parentage
s04e02.description: The study group's Halloween plans are put on hold when Pierce locks himself in the panic room of his "haunted" mansion.

s04e03.title: Conventions of Space and Time
s04e03.description: At the Inspector SpaceTime Convention, Abed finds a new "soulmate," Jeff discovers he looks like one of the show's villains, Shirley and Pierce join a focus group, and Annie pretends to be Jeff's wife.

s04e04.title: Alternative History of the German Invasion
s04e04.description: With Joel McHale, Gillian Jacobs, Danny Pudi, Yvette Nicole Brown. The Study Group loses access to the study room to the German foosballers, and Chang returns to campus, claiming to be suffering from "Changnesia."

s04e05.title: Cooperative Escapism in Familial Relations
s04e05.description: While Jeff and Britta spend Thanksgiving with Jeff's newly-discovered father and brother, the rest of the Study Group tries to escape from Shirley's dysfunctional family Thanksgiving celebration.

s04e06.title: Advanced Documentary Filmmaking
s04e06.description: Abed makes a new documentary chronicling Greendale's effort to get a research grant for "Changnesia," as well as Jeff's efforts to prove that Chang is faking his disease.

s04e07.title: Economics of Marine Biology
s04e07.description: Dean Pelton and Annie try to land a "whale" student while Jeff is assigned to keep Pierce occupied. Meanwhile, Troy and Shirley take a physical education education course, and Abed creates a fraternity to annoy the dean.

s04e08.title: Herstory of Dance
s04e08.description: While the dean sets up a Sadie Hawkins dance, Britta puts together a competing Sophie B. Hawkins dance. Meanwhile, Abed is set up with two dates to both dances by Annie and Shirley.

s04e09.title: Intro to Felt Surrogacy
s04e09.description: Dean Pelton prompts the study group to use puppets to relive the traumatic events of a recent adventure.

s04e10.title: Intro to Knots
s04e10.description: Jeff organizes a lovely holiday gathering at his apartment but Annie secretly invites Professor Cornwallis, to get in his good graces.

s04e11.title: Basic Human Anatomy
s04e11.description: When Annie (Alison Brie) and Shirley (Yvette Nicole Brown) learn that Leonard (Richard Erdman) is actually holding the spot as the class valedictorian, they join forces to bring him down.

s04e12.title: Heroic Origins
s04e12.description: Abed's research into the study group's history uncovers an overlooked series of chance encounters that led each of them to Greendale.

s04e13.title: Advanced Introduction to Finality
s04e13.description: A plan to celebrate Jeff's early graduation is unexpectedly disrupted by the study group's evil doppelgangers from the Darkest Timeline.

s05e01.title: Repilot
s05e01.description: Having failed in his second go-round as a lawyer, and unable to gather evidence for a potential lawsuit against Greendale, Jeff tries to convince the other former members of the Study Group to sue the school.

s05e02.title: Introduction to Teaching
s05e02.description: Jeff blows off his new teaching job at Greendale until Annie signs up for his class and forces him to teach, and Abed loses his religion when he takes a course about whether Nicolas Cage is good or bad.

s05e03.title: Basic Intergluteal Numismatics
s05e03.description: The college is imbued with panic when an unidentified person returns to dropping coins down people's butts and Annie takes it upon herself to find out who is behind it all.

s05e04.title: Cooperative Polygraphy
s05e04.description: After Pierce's unexpected passing, a team of investigators headed by the no-nonsense Mr. Stone arrives at Greendale to subject the study group to lie detector tests before they can be considered for distributions under the will.

s05e05.title: Geothermal Escapism
s05e05.description: As a going-away present to Troy before his around-the-world trip, Abed sets up a high-stakes game of "Hot Lava" at the college, but Britta suspects that the game is just masking his real feelings about Troy's departure.

s05e06.title: Analysis of Cork-Based Networking
s05e06.description: Annie and Hickey fight Greendale bureaucracy to install a bulletin board, Abed learns a lesson about sign language, and the others discover the challenges of planning a properly sensitive school dance.

s05e07.title: Bondage and Beta Male Sexuality
s05e07.description: Jeff helps Duncan score a date with Britta, and Abed has a Hickey encounter on his way to the movie theater.

s05e08.title: App Development and Condiments
s05e08.description: When a new app is beta tested on Greendale students, the campus soon descends into a dystopian society where status is determined by app standing.

s05e09.title: VCR Maintenance and Educational Publishing
s05e09.description: Whilst cleaning the storage room Jeff, Hickey and Shirley find a pile of unused hidden textbooks and plot a way to make the best out of it. Meanwhile, Annie and Abed are trying to find a new roommate.

s05e10.title: Advanced Advanced Dungeons & Dragons
s05e10.description: The group proposes a "sequel" to Dungeons & Dragons night when they need to get a skeptical professor Hickey to bond with his estranged son.

s05e11.title: G.I. Jeff
s05e11.description: The entire group becomes part of the cast of a classic "G.I. Joe" cartoon from the 1980s, which turns out to be part of Jeff's coping mechanism as he deals with a monumental life event.

s05e12.title: Basic Story
s05e12.description: After a liability audit, the Save Greendale Committee discovered that they have, in fact, saved Greendale - until they discover that as a result of the successful audit, the school is being sold to Subway.

s05e13.title: Basic Sandwich
s05e13.description: When the group learns about Greendale's first dean, they embark on a mission to find his old computer lab; Subway enlists Chang to spy on the group as part of its plan to take over the school.

s06e01.title: Ladders
s06e01.description: Dean Pelton hires an administrative consultant to organize things at Greendale.

s06e02.title: Lawnmower Maintenance & Postnatal Care
s06e02.description: Jeff and Frankie ask an inventor for help extracting Dean Pelton from his virtual reality world.

s06e03.title: Basic Crisis Room Decorum
s06e03.description: The Greendale gang goes on the offensive when a rival college releases an attack ad.

s06e04.title: Queer Studies & Advanced Waxing
s06e04.description: Dean Pelton is asked to lie; Chang auditions for a stage adaptation of "The Karate Kid."

s06e05.title: Laws of Robotics & Party Rights
s06e05.description: A prisoner attends Greendale via telerobot; Britta tries to get around one of Annie's rules.

s06e06.title: Basic Email Security
s06e06.description: A hacker threatens to publish emails unless a scheduled appearance by a racist comic is canceled.

s06e07.title: Advanced Safety Features
s06e07.description: An ex-boyfriend persuades Britta to join a guerilla marketing campaign.

s06e08.title: Intro to Recycled Cinema
s06e08.description: The committee, along with a movie producer named Maury, help Abed complete his unfinished film.

s06e09.title: Grifting 101
s06e09.description: When a clever clever con man, Professor DeSalvo, uses his class to cheat the study group, they enlist Jeff to get revenge. The situation goes awry as Britta and Dean Pelton get involved in Jeff and Professor DeSalvo's scamming competition.

s06e10.title: Basic RV Repair and Palmistry
s06e10.description: While on a road trip to get rid of a Greendale artifact, Abed turns a situation into a feature film.

s06e11.title: Modern Espionage
s06e11.description: When a secret game of paintball occurs on campus, Frankie threatens to expel those who participate.

s06e12.title: Wedding Videography
s06e12.description: A marriage proposal in Jeff's law class exposes a connection between the future bride and groom.

s06e13.title: Emotional Consequences of Broadcast Television
s06e13.description: As their sixth year at Greendale draws to a close, Abed asks everyone to imagine pitching a TV show about what they would do in season seven.
